summary: Mobile responsive optimization testing for Order Fulfillment page completed. All 9 features verified working correctly on Android mobile viewport (412x915 Pixel 6). Mobile layout includes compact header, 2-column KPI grid, horizontally scrollable stage tabs with scroll hint, stacked timer banner, and mobile card view for orders.
passed_tests: Page header shows compact title (text-xl sm:text-3xl) with truck icon
Refresh button shows icon-only on mobile (hidden xs:inline class hides text)
Refresh button size: 34x32px - meets touch target requirement
KPI cards display in 2-column grid on mobile (grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4)
KPI cards have mobile-optimized padding (p-2.5 sm:p-4)
KPI card text is readable with appropriate font sizes (text-[10px] sm:text-xs labels)
Stage tabs container is horizontally scrollable (scrollWidth=492px > clientWidth=372px)
Scroll hint gradient visible on right side (bg-gradient-to-l from-background)
Stage tabs have scrollbar-hide class to hide native scrollbar
Timer Required banner has stacked layout on mobile (flex-col sm:flex-row)
Start Timer button is full-width on mobile (w-full sm:w-auto) - 338px wide
Start Timer button meets 32px touch target (h-8 = 32px)
Order cards render in mobile card view container (.block.sm:hidden)
Desktop table hidden on mobile (.hidden.sm:block)
Mobile order cards show order number as clickable link
Mobile order cards show customer name
Mobile order cards show item count ('6 items')
Mobile order cards show stock status badge (OK/Low with appropriate colors)
View button meets 32px touch target
Move to next stage button meets 32px touch target
Dropdown menu button meets 32px touch target
Collapsible section buttons are full-width (362px)
Collapsible section buttons meet 40px touch target (h-10)
Page scrolls smoothly on mobile viewport
critical_code_review_comments: Mobile responsive classes are correctly applied with sm: breakpoint pattern
KPI cards use responsive grid: grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 for mobile 2-column layout
Stage tabs use overflow-x-auto and scrollbar-hide for horizontal scroll
Timer banner uses flex-col sm:flex-row for stacked layout on mobile
MobileOrderCard component renders correctly inside sm:hidden container
Action buttons have h-8 (32px) class for minimum touch target size
Order number button is smaller (20px) but functions as a link, not primary action - acceptable
seed_data_creation: Created temporary test orders (mobile_test_001, mobile_test_002) in test_database_training for mobile card testing, then cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Order Fulfillment page mobile responsiveness verified working. Key breakpoints: sm: (640px) for tablet, lg: (1024px) for desktop. Mobile view uses card layout for orders instead of table. Test orders in 'fulfill_print' stage are visible via /api/fulfillment/stages/fulfill_print/orders endpoint.
